text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Senpai… Mirako-senpai…! 
We're really cutting it close, you need to wake up…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Bwuhhh…? Ngh～ ……It's the weekend, though? 
Just let me sleep… a bit… more… 
Snore……

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
But, but…! We've got karaoke today, right? 
We're meeting at 11 in the living room, remember?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Running again and again, on these legs ♪ 
It'll be the best ♪ 
Forever ♪

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: (Clapping)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yayyy～ You're a total cutie pie, Dantsu-chan～!! 
Plus, Durandal-chan, you guys were killing it on the maracas, like, that was FAST.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! Looks like everybody's having a great time. 
Thanks for suggesting we do karaoke, Kuu-chan.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Now that everyone's got their own parts down, I thought we'd move on to the next step and get used to singing as a group, but…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Who knew karaoke was such good practice? 
I would've never come up with it myself. You're incredible.

text_block_list.name: HIshi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
No, come on, I'm not all that～ 
…Besides, I overslept, remember…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Huh? 
Actually, Kei-chan… You haven't sung at all today, have you?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I'm okay. I'm only doing the accompaniment anyway. 
More importantly, you guys——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, come on! It's karaoke! You can't stuff like that! 
So～ You like nursery rhymes, right? Then how about——

text_block_list.name: Kei-chan and Kuu-chan
text_block_list.text: Down roly poly acorn rolling merrily ♪ Down from the mountain and into a stream♪ Along came the loach saying "Would you like to play?"♪ "We'll be good friends and have such fun today" ♪

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: (Clapping)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Phew, good thing I knew that one～! 
Though apparently I've been misremembering the first part of the lyrics this whole time.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I get where you're coming from. 
…So, um, Kuu-chan. Thanks for singing with m——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Let's get this party started babyyyyyyyyyyy!!!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: Bwuh… Wha… What now!?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Stone O
text_block_list.text:
What do you mean 'what now' did you not hear what I said. 
Karaoke is so much fun that now I want to sing. 
Mic. Now. Gimme.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
O-okay, here you go…! 
What are you going to sing, Light O-chan? 
I'll put it on for you.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Sorry but there's not enough time to pick. 
Okay singing now!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
KITTY KITTY KITTY CAT CAT CAT 
KITTY KITTY KITTY CAT CAT CAT

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
KITTY FLUFFY FLOOF MEOW MEOW MEOW 
KITTY——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: What's wrong everyone. Remember we are the choir "Team Miraclez". Now let's sing together please.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Uh… what…!? 
…So we can just sing "meow", right…?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
There are limits to how accommodating you can be, Dantsu-san! 
You cannot allow yourself to be wrapped up in her pace——!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Good I see everyone is ready now. Okay one more time.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
KITTY FLUFFY FLOOF (Meow, meow, meow) 
KITTY MAKING BISCUITS (Meow, meow, meow)

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
KITTY IS KITTY BASICALLY KITTY 
INCREDIBLE KITTY THEREFORE KITTY

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
KITTY KITTY KITTY CAT CAT CAT CAT 
…Thank you! Thank you! Sniffle. Okay encore time!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: No, it's not "okay"!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Jeez, Light O-chan, you're such a… Wait, hang on! 
Kei-chan, were you about to say something?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Oh, it's nothing. 
Haha…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hahahahaha! 
This is so much fun, Kuu-chan!

text_block_list.name: HIshi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (Huh? Huuuhhh?? Huuhhhhhh??? I kinda…)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Hehe. Yep. 
It sure is, Kei-chan.
